INSERT INTO sales_order (sales_order_num, customer_num, order_date, total_price, emp_num) VALUES (#{sales_order_num}, #{customer_num}, sysdate, #{total_price}, #{emp_num})
mapper.select: SELECT so.sales_order_num, so.customer_num, NVL(c.client_name, '미지정') as client_name, so.order_date, so.total_price, so.emp_num, d.user_name as emp_name FROM sales_order so LEFT JOIN client c ON so.customer_num = c.client_num LEFT JOIN euser u ON so.emp_num = u.user_num LEFT JOIN euser_detail d ON u.user_num = d.user_num WHERE so.sales_order_num = #{sales_order_num}

SELECT so.sales_order_num, so.customer_num, NVL(c.client_name, '미지정') as client_name, so.order_date, so.total_price, so.emp_num, d.user_name as emp_name FROM sales_order so LEFT JOIN client c ON so.customer_num = c.client_num LEFT JOIN euser u ON so.emp_num = u.user_num LEFT JOIN euser_detail d ON u.user_num = d.user_num ORDER BY so.sales_order_num DESC
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO sales_order_detail (sales_order_num, product_num, quantity, unit_price) VALUES (#{sales_order_num}, #{product_num}, #{quantity}, #{unit_price})
mapper.select: SELECT d.sales_order_num, d.product_num, p.product_name, d.quantity, d.unit_price FROM sales_order_detail d JOIN product p ON d.product_num = p.product_num WHERE d.sales_order_num = #{sales_order_num}

SELECT TO_CHAR(order_date, 'YYYY-MM') AS "month", SUM(total_price) AS "total" FROM sales_order WHERE EXTRACT(YEAR FROM order_date) = EXTRACT(YEAR FROM SYSDATE) GROUP BY TO_CHAR(order_date, 'YYYY-MM') ORDER BY "month" ASC
